charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1101_0200_:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] got closer,
Florian noticed and said hello.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_0300_:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’m taking
a walk with Ogerpon.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_0400_:
Huh, I guess I never introduced you and
Ogerpon, did I.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_0500_: I met Ogerpon in the Land of Kitakami.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_0600_:
At the time, she was being targeted by some
troublesome Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_0401_0800_:
Yeah, we had a real hard time with them.
Here’s the story...
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1100_:
They stole some of Ogerpon’s precious
masks.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1200_:
And even worse, they tried to steal her
last one.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1300_:
So with Carmine’s help, we took the
masks back.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1400_:
If you can believe it, in old Kitakami legends,
those mask-stealing Pokémon were
portrayed as opposite what they really were!
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1500_:
According to the legends, Ogerpon was an
ogre that terrorized the village...
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1600_:
and those mask-stealing Pokémon were
the good guys, who saved the village by
driving the ogre away!
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1800_: Ogerpon definitely isn’t a bad Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_1900_:
But she IS mischief-loving and full of
curiosity!
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_2000_:
Anyway, I hope you’ll be friends with
Ogerpon too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_0401_2200_: Thanks! That’ll make Ogerpon happy as well.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_0402_2400_: Thanks! That’s great news. Right, Ogerpon?
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_2500_:
All right! If we’re going to get to know each
other better, the first thing we should do is a
Pokémon battle—
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_2800_: I’m not going to let this slide today!
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1101_2900_:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] and the others
watched Lear chase after Hoopa and
Gholdengo...
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_3000_:
Heheh... I guess there are other mischief-
loving Pokémon here on Pasio, eh?
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_3100_:
I think Ogerpon would become fast friends
with those two.
charaepi_ch0286_40_svboy/2301_1201_3200_:
Just make sure not to go full mischief mode
and anger Lear, OK?
